food.name: Early Bird Breakfast
food.description: Two eggs any style with your choice of bacon or sausage, toast or English muffin.

food.name: Chocolate Chip Belgian Waffles
food.description: Chocolate chip Belgian waffles covered with chocolate syrup and whipped cream.

food.name: Tofu Scramble
food.description: Tofu scrambled with a blend of seasonings and fresh garden vegetables.

food.name: Banana Bread French Toast
food.description: Our house special! French toast made from delicious banana bread with real maple syrup.

food.name: Breakfast Burrito
food.description: Our vegetarian burrito with scrambled eggs, beans, rice, cheddar cheese, and salsa.
